Invocation Name: seashore surgery center
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Dr. Michael J. Pecoraro is an acknowledged authority on cosmetic, reconstructive and hand repair procedures. He is triple Board Certified and has performed thousands of operations for more than 15 years. A few of the more common procedures performed include breast augmentation and breast reduction, nasal surgery, eyelid surgery, abdominoplasty, face lifts, and liposuction. Micro and hand surgery procedures include carpal tunnel surgery, DeQuervain’s, Dupuytrens, tensynovitis, and flexor tendon injuries.
